messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Our military presence is inadequate in your sector. We need you to construct BSA-35 Artillery position aboard your station. Base parts are available for shipping via cargo. -Nanotrasen Naval Command

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello people of the station, it is AYE. THE HONK MASTER. By the by I hope your lives on the station are pranked filled. Oh and I don't like violent pranks, if someone dies then no one can laugh about it thats my motto!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Solar Array.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So who likes tequila? I do makes pranks MUCH MUCH MUCH better. ANYWAY I heard bombs which mean someone is having fun. WITHOUT ME!!! But then again if someone did die in the bombings then shit it ain't a prank ..... bro

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It's your clown captain here, why does Ian have a hat and why is there more bombs. Oh and more pranks more fun blah blah blah. HAIL THE HONKMOTHER. I think I have said it all.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There seems to be a virus going round and taya is a carrier so im going to hold out in my bunker and stay alive

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Solar Array.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So, new objective. Make a virus to make people laugh OR slip, Either one will be good enough and if anyone says it is not possible then they will see a nice round pie coming to their face at dangerous velocity .... THANKEIS!!! -Your clown captain

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The virus will kill us all so try to have fun untill then-this is your captain sighning off now.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: But not clown captain ... upupupupupupup COUGH uuahahh SHIT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The captain has shaved ian and is now trying to shave me PLEASE SEND HELP!!!!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Clown captain will not shave ... he is speaking his mind. Cap cap want me to shave I will not do it. he has already shaven IAN and killed him

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We're stuck inside hop's office

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Monastery Maintenance.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The cap is going now, BUT I the CLOWN CAP WILL STAY TOO GUIDE YOU ALL IN THE NAME OF THE .... DUN DUN DUUUNNN honkmother ... oh and sec you motherfuckers ... thanks for the sport!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I will call the shuttle IF I get the head of Wih-Skee who abused me while playing a peaceful past time sportin event that some of you took part in

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
